title: Notice
content:
wffweb-12.0.2 is released on 01/14/2025, it supports Java 17 or later. However, Java 21 or later is recommended for best performance as it can utilize Virtual Thread to do internal operations.

As per Maven repository analytics data, 4000+ new wffweb projects are created every month.

wffweb-3 reached EOL so upgrade your project now.
